articles.title: Shot in the arm for SA as Patrick Soon-Shiong announces Covid-19 and cancer vaccines initiative - SowetanLIVE
articles.description: South African-American business tycoon Patrick Soon-Shiong has announced the launch of an SA Covid-19 and cancer vaccine initiative.

articles.title: South Africa seethes at UK's Beta bogeyman 'discrimination' - Eyewitness News
